tasks.title: Complete project report
tasks.desc: Finish the final report for the project and submit it to the manager.

tasks.title: Client meeting
tasks.desc: Attend the meeting with the client to discuss project updates.

tasks.title: Code review
tasks.desc: Review the code submitted by the team and provide feedback.

tasks.title: Design mockup
tasks.desc: Create a mockup for the new landing page.

tasks.title: Update documentation
tasks.desc: Update the project documentation with the latest changes.

tasks.title: Fix bugs
tasks.desc: Resolve the bugs reported in the last sprint.

tasks.title: Prepare presentation
tasks.desc: Create slides for the upcoming client presentation.

tasks.title: Team meeting
tasks.desc: Schedule a meeting to discuss the next sprint planning.

tasks.title: Develop feature X
tasks.desc: Start development on the new feature requested by the client.

tasks.title: Test application
tasks.desc: Perform unit testing on the new features.

tasks.title: Write test cases
tasks.desc: Create test cases for the new functionality added.

tasks.title: Code optimization
tasks.desc: Optimize the existing code for better performance.

tasks.title: Prepare deployment
tasks.desc: Get the application ready for deployment to the production environment.

tasks.title: User feedback review
tasks.desc: Review and categorize feedback from users.

tasks.title: Database migration
tasks.desc: Migrate the database to the new server.

tasks.title: Security audit
tasks.desc: Conduct a security audit on the application.

tasks.title: Bug triage
tasks.desc: Prioritize bugs reported by users.

tasks.title: Create API documentation
tasks.desc: Document the API endpoints for the new features.

tasks.title: Update website content
tasks.desc: Refresh the content on the company website.

tasks.title: Prepare release notes
tasks.desc: Write the release notes for the upcoming version.
